meanings.definition: To make three times as much or as many
meanings.sent1: She tripled her savings by working extra hours.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for the sugar to be tripled for a sweeter taste.
meanings.sent3: The magician tripled the number of rabbits in his hat, much to the audience's surprise.
meanings.sent4: His excitement tripled when he saw the surprise party waiting for him.
meanings.sent5: The flowers in the garden tripled in beauty after the rain shower.

meanings.definition: To become three times as much or as many
meanings.sent1: The number of attendees tripled after the event was advertised on social media.
meanings.sent2: The population of the town tripled in just a few years due to new job opportunities.
meanings.sent3: The cat's curiosity tripled when it saw the shiny object dangling from a string.
meanings.sent4: Her heart rate tripled as she reached the finish line of the race.
meanings.sent5: The excitement in the room tripled as the surprise guest entered.
